alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Butler County through 415 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Potwin, or 9 miles east of Whitewater, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater and Elbing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
